Uses of Class
tilt.exception.TiltException

  • Packages that use TiltException 
    Package Description
    tilt.exception
    This package holds exception classes specific to the TILT2 web-service
    tilt.handler
    These classes handle the various types of REST request (PUT,DELETE,GET,POST) and also specific services, such as returning images referred to on HTMLpages (TiltImageHandler) and GeoJson (GeoJsonHandler).
    tilt.image
    This package handles everything directly related to the manipulation of images, and preparing them for text-to-image linking.
    tilt.test
    This package is for testing the TILT Java webservice and is not required for the functioning of TILT.

      class  DoSException

      class  SplitException
